svg.text: Earth became dark. Scan for life, keep us alive in the minds of others. (Arrow keys to move/scan objects)

('W', 'S' keys)",s:rand(200,500),h:getColor("000000"),u:"a"},{t:"",s:rand(200,500),h:getColor("56ccff"),w:"t"}],soundIndex=0;const music=[["311.1"],["164.8"],["311.1"],1,["1661","square",.01],["587.3","triangle"],1,1,["311.1"],["164.8"],["311.1"],1,["1661","square",.01],["587.3","triangle"]];let playTone,interval,setDirection={0:[0,-2],30:[1,-2],60:[2,-1],90:[2,0],120:[2,1],150:[1,1],180:[0,2],210:[-1,2],240:[-1,1],270:[-2,0],300:[-1,-1],330:[-1,-2]},AudioContext=window.AudioContext||window.webkitAudioContext,context=new AudioContext,o=null,g=null,tickCount=0,soundEnabled=!1;function init(){soundButton.addEventListener("click",()=>{soundEnabled=!soundEnabled},!1),document.addEventListener("keydown",keyHandling,!1),genMaps(),layoutStars(),layoutBodies(),interval=setInterval(tick,10)}function tick(){move(),soundEnabled&&tickCount%30==0&&(playTone&&1!==music[soundIndex]&&sound(music[soundIndex][0],music[soundIndex][1]||void 0,music[soundIndex][2]||void 0),music[++soundIndex]||(playTone=!1,soundIndex=0)),tickCount++}function keyHandling(e){let t={ArrowLeft:()=>{degrees-=30},ArrowRight:()=>{degrees+=30},ArrowUp:()=>{let e=degrees+"";gravityDrive&&Math.abs(velocityX)<9&&Math.abs(velocityY)<9?(velocityX+=setDirection[e][0],velocityY+=setDirection[e][1]):(velocityX=setDirection[e][0],velocityY=setDirection[e][1])},ArrowDown:scan,s:()=>{longRangeScanners&&(longRangeScanners="t"===longRangeScanners?"f":"t")},w:()=>{ftl&&(sector[0]=rand(0,1e3),sector[1]=rand(0,1e3),positionX=rand(10,4500),positionY=rand(10,4500),layoutBodies(),text.textContent="")}}[e.key];t&&t()}function move(){360===degrees&&(degrees=0),degrees<0&&(degrees=360+degrees),positionX+velocityX>5e3&&(sector[1]+=1,layoutBodies(),text.textContent="",positionX=0),positionX+velocityX<0&&(sector[1]-=1,layoutBodies(),text.textContent="",positionX=5e3),positionY+velocityY>5e3&&(sector[0]+=1,layoutBodies(),text.textContent="",positionY=0),positionY+velocityY<0&&(sector[0]-=1,layoutBodies(),text.textContent="",positionY=5e3),positionX+=velocityX,positionY+=velocityY,ship.style.transform="translate("+positionX+"px, "+positionY+"px) rotate("+degrees+"deg)",soundButton.style.transform="translate("+(positionX-400)+"px, "+(positionY-220)+"px)",longRangeScanners&&"t"===longRangeScanners?svg.setAttribute("viewBox","0 0 5000 5000"):svg.setAttribute("viewBox",positionX-225+" "+(positionY-225)+" 500 500")}function layoutStars(){for(let e=0;e<1e3;e++){addElement(2).style.transform="translate("+5e3*Math.random()+"px, "+5e3*Math.random()+"px)"}}function layoutBodies(){let e=objects.querySelectorAll(".c");for(let t=0;t<e.length;t++)e[t]&&e[t].remove();if(!map[sector[0]]||!map[sector[0]][sector[1]])return void win();let t=map[sector[0]][sector[1]];if(t.length>0)for(let e=0;e<t.length;e++){let o=addElement(Math.floor(t[e].s),t[e].h,t[e].p||void 0);if(o.classList.add("c"),t[e].c||(t[e].c=[],t[e].c[0]=rand(0,5e3),t[e].c[1]=rand(0,5e3)),t[e].n&&(t[e].n=sector[1]+""+t[e].c[1]+sector[0]+t[e].h.replace("#","-")),o.style.transform="translate("+t[e].c[1]+"px, "+t[e].c[0]+"px)",t[e].m)return void multipleObjects(o,t[e])}}function multipleObjects(e,t){let o=rand(1,10);o>10&&(o=10);for(let n=0;n<o;n++){let o=255*Math.random()|0,n=o<<16|o<<8|o,r=(n.toString(16),e.cloneNode(!0));r.style.transform="translate("+(t.c[1]+500*Math.random())+"px, "+(t.c[0]+600*Math.random())+"px) scale("+Math.random()+") rotate("+360*Math.random()+"deg)",r.style.fill="#"+n.toString(16),objects.appendChild(r)}}function scan(){soundEnabled&&sound(261.6,"sine",.1),radar.style.opacity=.8,setTimeout(()=>{radar.style.opacity=0},400),velocityX=0,velocityY=0;let e=map[sector[0]][sector[1]];text.textContent="Tir: Hello?",text.style.transform="translate("+positionX+"px, "+positionY+"px)";for(let t=0;t<e.length;t++)if(Math.abs(positionX-(e[t].c[1]+e[t].s))<300&&Math.abs(positionY-(e[t].c[0]+e[t].s))<300){if(playTone=!0,e[t].w){win("w");break}e[t].u&&("w"===e[t].u&&(ftl=!0),"r"===e[t].u&&(longRangeScanners="f"),"s"===e[t].u&&(gravityDrive=!0),"a"===e[t].u&&(ftl=!0,longRangeScanners="f",gravityDrive=!0));let o=e[t].t;e[t].n&&(o=o.replace("$",e[t].n)),text.textContent="Tir: Hello? Response: "+o;break}}function addElement(e,t,o){let n=document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg",o?"polygon":"circle");return o?n.setAttribute("points",o):(n.setAttribute("cx",e),n.setAttribute("cy",e),n.setAttribute("r",e/2)),n.setAttribute("fill",t||"#fff"),objects.appendChild(n),n}function genMaps(){for(let e=0;e<1e3;e++){map.push([]);for(let t=0;t<1e3;t++){let o=[];if(500===e&&500===t){let e={...general[0]};e.s=200,e.c=[2100,2225],e.h="#18cef1",o.push(e)}else Math.random()>.5&&o.push(generateSpaceObject()),Math.random()>.5&&o.push(generateSpaceObject()),Math.random()>.5&&o.push(generateSpaceObject()),Math.random()>.95&&o.push(generateSpecial());map[e].push(o)}}}function generateSpaceObject(){return{...general[Math.floor(Math.random()*general.length)]}}function generateSpecial(){return{...specials[Math.floor(Math.random()*specials.length)]}}function getColor(e){return"#"+e+(1e8*Math.random()).toString(16).substring(0,6-e.length)}function rand(e,t){let o=Math.floor(Math.random()*t);return o<e?e:o}function sound(e,t,n,r){o=context.createOscillator(),(g=context.createGain()).gain.value=n||.05,o.type=t||"triangle",o.connect(g),o.frequency.value=e,g.connect(context.destination),o.start(0),g.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(1e-5,context.currentTime+(r||2))}function win(e){clearInterval(interval),text.textContent="",objects.style.opacity=0,text.style.opacity=0,text.classList.add("e");let t=text.cloneNode(!0),o=text.cloneNode(!0);svg.appendChild(t),svg.appendChild(o),setTimeout(function(){let t=svg.querySelectorAll(".e"),o=["You are probe. Welcome home. We sent you out when all hope had escaped us. ","You were to tell others of our story, so not all was lost. You have done well. ","Speak your journey. Come, rest our friend. Together."],n=["We have watched you for millennia. You are a testiment to your creators. ","Few have built anything that traveled beyond this galaxies wall. Come rest. ","You have done well. We will honor you and your journey. Together."];for(let r=0;r<t.length;r++)t[r].style.transform="translate("+positionX+"px, "+(positionY-50*(3-r))+"px)",t[r].textContent="w"===e?o[r]:n[r],t[r].style.opacity=0,setTimeout(()=>{t[r].style.opacity=1},3e3*r)},4e3)}init();
